column4: Hey does anyone know a guide for turning folders into ISO's with ubuntu???

usually advice for how to do things is given in commands because they're easier than telling someone to go to places and press certian buttons.  With the CLI, you can copy and paste the commands as people give them to you without needing to do much extra.
in brasero, you have to go through it as you would make a data CD.  When the pop up comes up asking what drive to burn to, you can choose file image instead.
